channel.title: Disconnect this from SGU?
channel.description:
A friend brought in this shiny new idea: *why SGU?*
I don't know.
Maybe I should indeed make this a completely separated project. After all, nobody from SGU showed any interest in it and so it's just a fan-made website. Maybe that way it could bring more interest in the project from a wider audience... I'm just not sure I wanted to see it become too big. Not really something to worry right now, huh?
What do you think? ( *Is anyone there?* )

item.title: Disconnect this from SGU?
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Whatever. I'm doing it. But just the disconnect, mainly (except for the domain, too much work for now). I still won't make it a new project. (Nobody cares, why should I?)

Read full topic
